argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_errel | |- ( R Er A -> Rel R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_relcnv | |- Rel `' R |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( R Er A -> R Er A ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_ersymb | |- ( R Er A -> ( y R x <-> x R y ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_vex | |- y e. _V |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_brcnv | |- ( x `' R y <-> y R x ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( x `' R y <-> <. x , y >. e. `' R ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_bitr3i | |- ( y R x <-> <. x , y >. e. `' R ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( x R y <-> <. x , y >. e. R ) |
| 11 | 4, 9, 10 | #P_3bitr3g | |- ( R Er A -> ( <. x , y >. e. `' R <-> <. x , y >. e. R ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eqrelrdv2 | |- ( ( ( Rel `' R /\ Rel R ) /\ R Er A ) -> `' R = R ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_mpanl1 | |- ( ( Rel R /\ R Er A ) -> `' R = R ) |
| 14 | 1, 13 | #P_mpancom | |- ( R Er A -> `' R = R ) |
